full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 74 of 261 1235
LC6Cmax3 Kate - cross
1 A. Yes.
2 Q. Your mother and your stepfather, and in turn, you and your brother lived a comfortable life at some point, didn't you?
3 
4 A. Yes.
5 Q. You lived in the Belgravia section of London. That's a very tony area of London, isn't it?
6 
7 A. Yes.
8 Q. And you lived quite close to Kinnerton Street, which is where Ghislaine lived; correct?
9 
10 A. Yes.
11 Q. In fact, Ghislaine lived on the street that also is the street of the Nags Head Pub; correct?
12 
13 A. Yes.
14 Q. And that pub is a rather famous pub in London, isn't it?
15 A. I don't know.
16 Q. But it was right across the street, nonetheless, from Ghislaine's home at 44 Kinnerton, wasn't it?
17 
18 A. Yes.
19 Q. Now, going back to your mother for a moment, you would watch and see the attention that your mother got because of her beauty, didn't you?
20 
21 beauty, didn't you?
22 A. I thought she was beautiful.
23 Q. And didn't you say that you wanted to garner that same kind of attention because you liked the way people looked at her?
24 
25 MS. POMERANTZ: Objection, your Honor.
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00018411
